abstract: What turned heads at the Value Voters meeting was the low support registered for the two presumed front-runners for the Republican nomination, Mitt Romney and Rick Perry.
snippet: What turned heads at the Value Voters meeting was the low support registered for the two presumed front-runners for the Republican nomination, Mitt Romney and Rick Perry.
lead_paragraph: Wildly enthusiastic Ron Paul supporters, including busloads of college students, have been a visible presence at the Values Voters Summit in Washington, so no one was surprised when Mr. Paul won the conference's annual straw poll of presidential preferences on Saturday.

headline.main: Ron Paul Wins Conference Straw Poll, to No One's Surprise
